alert.note: Alert for Keweenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 05 at 8:30PM EDT until September 05 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Keweenaw County in western Upper Michigan... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 829 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Windigo, or 21 miles southwest of Siskiwit Lake, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted on Isle Royale National Park include... Siskiwit Lake, Windigo, and Mount Desor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near Lake Superior, get away from the water and move indoors. Remember, lightning can strike out to 15 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm. Persons in campgrounds should seek sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
